data: `teleport` is an Event Response that will teleport a target randomly around the destination point.

data.Name: avoid_water
data.Description: Determines if the teleport avoids putting the target in water.

data.Name: land_on_block
data.Description: Determines if the teleport places the target on a block.

data.Name: max_range
data.Description: Max range the target can teleport relative to the origin destination.

data.Name: [target](../../../EntityReference/Examples/FilterList.md)
data.Description: The target context to execute against.
